commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: These must be the main grounds! We might get lost in this huge crowd if we're not careful.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Shizuku, no more fidgeting. Make sure you keep up.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Um... Do I really look okay in the swimsuit you picked out for me?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It suits you. I promise.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Is that the aqua course? It really does float, huh? And there's a slide and a jungle gym and all sorts of stuff! All right, I'm gonna play like I've never played before!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Wait! It's not safe to get into the water without warming up first. Let's start with some stretches.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hm? What are you looking at, Hanamaru?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Girls... I've found something awesome, zura.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What, this beach hut? It looks pretty normal to... Oh, you mean this?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Uh-huh! The super-loaded shaved ice prepared specially for today's event! And there are only ten servings available! We just HAVE to try one, zura!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Super-loaded shaved ice... They sound absolutely delectable!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, there's someone with one now. My goodness, look at it shimmer. It's like a gemstone.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Today only? Ten servings? So that means there's only nine left! Yeah, we'll totally be missing out if we don't try any.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Special, limited...super-loaded shaved ice...!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So, what is it? Are we gonna eat before taking on the aqua course? I don't mind either way.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I say let's chow down, zura!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'll have one too. Who knows when we'll get a chance like this again?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I would also like to have a taste of this masterpiece shaved ice.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: W-Wait! You'll chill your core if you eat shaved ice before swimming! Um... Tea! How about we have some hot tea instead?!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Aww, what? Tea?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes! Not to mention, if we all order one each, we'd be hoarding six whole servings out of ten! No, out of nine!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I believe it is very unbecoming of school idols, who should be forever showing gratitude for our fans' support, to be hoarding so much shaved ice!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I fail to see the correlation.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm, I understand where Umi is coming from. We don't know exactly how many servings are left. We might even end up clearing them out with our order.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh, right... That wouldn't be fair to the other customers, huh...

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yeah. I guess we shouldn't hoard it for ourselves, zura.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: All right... Unfortunate though it may be, let us trade shaved ice for tea instead...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Huh? Oh, but, um... Excessive denial of your cravings is not great for one's mental health either, so if you absolutely must eat it, then that choice still remains!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Make up your mind!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: So we can have some, zura?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: However! As previously mentioned, we cannot buy out the remaining shaved ice. Let's decide who gets to eat it through an aqua course competition!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Since there are exactly six of us, we'll split into three teams, 's, Aqours, and Nijigasaki. The first team to complete the whole obstacle course gets the shaved ice.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. That way we're doing the aqua course first and getting by with only two orders of shaved ice. How fun is that? We'll get to work for our reward.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: The faster we finish the course, the higher our odds of being able to order a couple of those limited shaved ice.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Right! I wanted to jump right into the aqua course myself, so I'm all for Umi's suggestion!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'll do anything for shaved ice, zura! I'll triumph in the name of tasty treats, zura!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: *Sigh* Yeah, all right. If that's what we're doing then.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Then that settles it. I hereby officially announce the start of the aqua course race for the super-loaded shaved ice!
